headline: Oceania’s 2026 Heritage Cruises Test Norwegian’s Premium Pricing Story
summary: Oceania Cruises, part of Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings, has launched a series of themed 2026 Alaska and New England sailings tied to America's 250th anniversary. The offer centers on commemorative voyages that align itineraries with the semiquincentennial, targeting guests interested in both cruising and U.S. heritage travel. These departures are scheduled for the 2026 season and are intended to create a differentiated product within Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings' premium portfolio. For...
